name: AbortionStats
0:
”Alexa, ask Abortion Stats how many abortions have been performed”
”Alexa, ask Abortion Stats how many abortions have been performed in the world”
”Alexa, ask Abortion Stats how many have occurred”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: abortion stats
des: Do you ever wonder how many abortions are occurring around the country or around the world? This skill can tell you. Based on the most recent statistics on abortion, you can find out how many abortions have been performed so far this year.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
